Prepare yourself for the warmup Exercise lightly: you should be able to talk while you warmup Go as hard as you can to sustain the whole 4 minutes. You can do this! Exercise lightly: steady your heartbeat without stopping Breathe, go at slow and relaxed pace that allows you to relax but don\'t stop now Congratulations! You arrived at the end of this workout!
